title: Bitcoin hits new all-time high above $112,000 as investors pile into stocks and crypto

title: BlackRock adds $24 bln to crypto portfolio
description: BlackRock significantly ramped up its digital asset exposure in the first half of 2025, adding nearly $24 bln to its crypto portfolio, according to Finbold’s H1 2025 Cryptocurrency Market Report. The asset manager’s holdings climbed from $54.77 bln on January 1 to $78.67 bln by June 30, a 30.38% increase, driven primarily by inflows into its spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, which launched earlier this year. “This surge in on-chain holdings reflects massive investor demand for spot crypto ETFs and BlackRock’s strategic positioning to meet it,” said Jordan Major, senior analyst at ...
